member.name: T:_2._semesterprojekttest.Interfaces.ICouponService
member.summary: This interface used to access the Coupon service methods.

member.name: M:_2._semesterprojekttest.Interfaces.ICouponService.GetUserCoupons(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method fetches the current users available coupons from the database.
member.returns: A List of all the Coupons that driver has earned.

member.name: M:_2._semesterprojekttest.Interfaces.ICouponService.GetCouponCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: This class is used to count how many coupons a specific driver has earned.
member.returns: A number of how many coupons

member.name: M:_2._semesterprojekttest.Interfaces.ICouponService.AddCouponCount(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Updates the Couponcount for by a certain amount for a driver in Driver table
member.param: The amount you want to add to the counter
member.returns: True if it succeed or false if it fails
